translations: n.[内科]抽搐；社会动乱；哄堂大笑；震动（convulsion 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Thirteen per cent said they became unconscious at night and 5 per cent suffered convulsions.
sentences.translation: 13%的人说晚上他们失去知觉，5%的人说他们晚上抽搐。

sentences.sentence: This unexpected result threw the company into convulsions of merriment.
sentences.translation: 这个意想不到的结果使大家笑得前仰后合。
